<p style="text-align:justify;">
I am a postodoctoral researcher at [Utrecht University](https://www.uu.nl/staff/manschobben). 
</p>

My current research profile encompasses three main areas of interest: 

* [Carbonate diagenesis and stratigraphy](https://martinschobben.github.io/webpage/Projects.html#_carbonate_diagenesis_and_stratigraphy)

* [Strangelove oceans vs. living oceans](https://martinschobben.github.io/webpage/Projects.html#_strangelove_oceans_vs_living_oceans_)

* [Isotope palaeontology](https://martinschobben.github.io/webpage/Projects.html#_isotope_palaeontology_)
